TickerQBackground Task Scheduler for .NET

Source generator-based job scheduling with Entity Framework Core persistence and real-time dashboard

Get Started
View on GitHub
üîß

Source Generator Architecture

Uses C# source generators to discover and register jobs at compile time through ModuleInitializers

üìÖ

Two Job Types

Time-based tickers for one-time/delayed execution and Cron-based tickers for recurring schedules

üíæ

Flexible Persistence

In-memory provider for development and Entity Framework Core provider for production persistence

üìä

Dashboard UI

Vue.js dashboard with SignalR for real-time job monitoring and management

üîÑ

Retry & Priority

Configurable retry policies with intervals and job priority levels (LongRunning, High, Normal, Low)

üèóÔ∏è

Dependency Injection

Full integration with ASP.NET Core dependency injection and scoped services

Quick Start ‚Äã

csharp
// 1. Define a job using TickerFunction attribute
[TickerFunction("ProcessOrder")]
public static async Task ProcessOrder(
    TickerFunctionContext<OrderData> context,
    CancellationToken cancellationToken)
{
    var order = context.Request;
    // Process the order
}

// 2. Add TickerQ to services
builder.Services.AddTickerQ(options =>
{
    options.SetMaxConcurrency(10);
});

// 3. Activate TickerQ
app.UseTickerQ();
